meanings.definition: A metal or plastic cover for the center of a wheel, used to protect the wheel and improve the appearance of a vehicle.
meanings.sent1: The shiny hubcap on the car gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic replaced the missing hubcap on the tire.
meanings.sent3: When the hubcap fell off, it rolled down the street like a little metal donut.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a hubcap, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The hubcap spun off the wheel like a tiny silver Frisbee.
